prepare: TIPS TO PREPARE FOR GCE EXAMS

quote.text: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
quote.author: Colin Powell

intro: Only those students who have an effective study method and who plan and optimize their study sessions are more likely to easier pass the GCE-A/OL exams than others.
The student who wants to pass his O/A-Level exam:

enClasse.title: At school
points: Is diligent , attentive and actively participates in classes from day one;
Is always motivated and determined to learn and succeed.

aLaMaison.title: At home
points: Plans his study sessions with a revision schedule, periodically adjusted if necessary, and which he scrupulously follow;
Summarizes on a daily basis each lesson for each subject with help of well-prepared and structured summary sheets which he then learns intelligently

avecCamarades.title: With his class mates
avecCamarades.text: Learn in study groups and practise continuously using sample-tests in class or old papers

internet.title: Internet
internet.text: Use Internet to optimize his study session download or consult sample-tests and hold papers

sport.title: Sport
sport.text: By eating a healthy and balanced diet; by having adequate and constant rest (at leas t 7 hours of sleep per day) practising sport regularly to relax. By avoiding alcohol, drugs and narcotics consumption, which not only impair thinking, judgement and working ability but also, more importantly, damage health irreversibly.

astuces.title: Tips for your study sessions
astuces.intro: Identify what kind of leaner you are and adjust your study method accordingly:

profils.label: Visually:
profils.text: you learn best with the help of graphics, diagrams, videos, summary sheets, etc.

profils.label: Auditory:
profils.text: you learn best by listening; you will tend to learn by heart;

profils.label: Kinesthetic:
profils.text: you need practice and do it yourself to understand and assimilate;

profils.label: Communicative:
profils.text: you learn more easily in pairs or groups.

astuces.conclusion: Use as many learning channels as possible at once: visual, auditory, kinaesthetic.

veilleExam.title: The day before and the day of the exam
points: ─ Go to bed early after gathering documents and tools needed for the next day (National ID-Card, calculator, pens, etc.)
Important: wear something you are comfortable in;

On exam’s day, make sure to be at the exam’s place on time; follow the invigilators' instructions; take the time to read each paper carefully, several times if necessary. Then deal with the subjects without haste, starting with the easiest ones
N.B.: allow time to re-read your paper to avoid mistakes, miscalculations, misunderstandings, etc.
